short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist tab manager. Search, switch, rearrange, and close tabs from the toolbar menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Menu is a minimalist tab manager for Chrome. It enables you to search, switch, rearrange, and close tabs from the toolbar menu. It supports both mouse operations as well as keyboard operations.
